Respectfully Professional Process

The goal of the Respectfully Professional Process is to provide Quality over Quantity and Relationships over Transactions – ultimately saving time for everyone. We achieve this goal by gaining a deep understanding of what both the client and the job seeker are looking for while treating everyone the way that we want to be treated. The result is that we deliver a solution that works for everyone.

Client
Candidate

Discovery

When engaging a client, we perform an initial needs analysis to ascertain what you are looking for, what you want to avoid, and then only present solutions that are a fit.

Discovery

When engaging a job seeker, we spend time to understand career goals, objectives, and background before discussing opportunities or compensation. It’s our goal to build long-term relationships rather than just throw out a job and salary to see if we can make a transaction happen.

Approach

Anyone can match keywords on a resume to your job description - what separates RX2 Solutions is that we go much deeper to ensure fit. Our value add is that we take the extra time to vet candidates and to provide options based on your specific requirements. We provide candidates across your budget range so you can see a broad cross-section of the current market.

Approach

We are here to be on your team and to be your advocate. It’s our job to open doors for you and provide market insight so you can make informed decisions. We only present you to opportunities after we have gone through our process and you give us the approval to do so.

Communication

Communication is key in any successful partnership and we will be with you throughout the entire hiring process. We will provide you with real-time market insight, and recalibrate our search based on your feedback and the market demands.

Deployment

We are here to help facilitate interviews, share progress, report market conditions, set reasonable expectations, and ultimately deliver the solution that you want.

Communication

In any relationship communication is key and we will be in touch with you throughout the entire hiring process. Our goal is to create an enjoyable job-hunting experience while setting realistic expectations.

Deploymet

We are here to provide insight into how specific opportunities align with what you’re looking for, discuss market trends, help prepare you for interviews, provide resume cleanup, facilitate the hiring process, and ultimately find you the opportunity you are looking for.
